title: <bdo>
description: The `<bdo>` HTML element overrides the current text directionality (left-to-right or right-to-left) for its content, allowing bidirectional text to be properly rendered.
content: The element that stands for Bi-Directional Override. It overrides the current text direction, allowing developers to force text to be displayed left-to-right or right-to-left, regardless of the surrounding context.
